tweets.text: @Exmoor_Mires @dartmoornpa @moorsforfuture @KatyThorpe12 @EnvAgencySW I am intrigued by the term "contour bunds" - what distinguishes them from non-contour bunds, please?

Hi @EnvAgencySE  @EnvAgency @RedbridgeLive , we have polluting fly tiping, a danger to animals, by the River Roding.  Reported in July, still there.  Can you please talk to each other and get it moved.  Would appreciate a response, as would @SoWoSociety @ local walkers, residents https://t.co/NY9Hrv5hir

Don't feed a fatberg.

Putting used cooking fat and oil down your sink can block pipes, creating fatbergs.

Wait for used fat and oil to cool before scraping it into the bin.

Share this video and help protect the environment.

#Unblocktober https://t.co/O24wtjE4oR

Contour bunds on Hangingstone Hill, Dartmoor. Put in last winter and looking lovely now, very subtle but keeping large areas wet.  Lots and lots of these up there now. @dartmoornpa @moorsforfuture @KatyThorpe12 @ypp_peat @EnvAgencySW https://t.co/pT0AV6fV2N

tweets.text: Dunball Sluice in Bridgwater is the only outlet for the King‚Äôs Sedgemoor Drain, and is key to managing water on the Somerset Levels and Moors. @EnvAgencySW gives a tour of the site, and what is being planned for the future. Watch and learn more at https://t.co/6db3gXk1HQ https://t.co/nPw8SUIQwX

urls.title: Working together to improve the water environment
urls.description: Connect and learn with thousands of organisations, who are delivering collaborative water management for the benefit of future generations.

tweets.text: Catchment Partnerships work together to improve the water environment & surrounding landscape for people & wildlife. The Adur & Ouse Partnership has launched its website & story map. Visit https://t.co/IshAZtOJtT & https://t.co/crLw4rjK9l to find out more. @OuseAdurRT @CaBAtweets https://t.co/TDpObS3Krk

Want to find out about how we've been repairing our #flood defences damaged in the winter 19/20 #floods & how we're ready to tackle priority issues such as #flooding this winter?

Tune into @ITVCentral tonight to hear from @PaulReevesEA in Matlock & @DaveThroupEA in Leominster. https://t.co/RARXAShOj4

We have been training our contractors so they can provide additional support during the winter months.

We set them a short notice task to test how quick they could respond to blockages - we were happy with the results. 

Before and after picsüì∏ #Peterborough #winter https://t.co/9Z4eH6CfAo

tweets.text: This is the River Moss near Sheffield where we‚Äôve been to check why there‚Äôs fewer creepy-crawlies in it than there should be. Invertebrates are an important marker for a healthy river, so we‚Äôre encouraged by our latest test results, which show that water quality is good https://t.co/YIJJAnptQD

With Covid-19 creating uncertainty over the future, is economic recovery at odds with the needs of the planet? @DeniseBower1310 argues the opposite is true, the benefit-to-cost ratio of investment into resilience creates opportunities for those who act to prevent direct losses. https://t.co/9PA9so80JY
